entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
